Package com.thomasjensen.checkstyle.addons.checks.regexp

Checks that primarily apply regular expressions to stuff.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RegexpOnFilenameCheck
    This check applies a given regular expression to the names of files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RegexpOnFilenameOption
    Represents the possible modes of operation for the RegexpOnFilenameCheck.

Package com.thomasjensen.checkstyle.addons.checks.regexp Description

Checks that primarily apply regular expressions to stuff.
Author:
Thomas Jensen
